----
const response = await client.search({
  index: "news",
  query: {
    match: {
      content: "elasticsearch",
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    sample: {
      sampler: {
        shard_size: 100,
      },
      aggs: {
        keywords: {
          significant_text: {
            field: "content",
            filter_duplicate_text: true,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
----
